name: Push-Up
description: A bodyweight exercise targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Squat
description: A lower body exercise that strengthens the thighs, hips, and buttocks.

name: Pull-Up
description: An upper-body strength exercise that works the back and biceps.

name: Sit-Up
description: Abdominal exercise that strengthens the core muscles.

name: Bench Press
description: A compound weightlifting movement that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Deadlift
description: A strength training exercise that targets the posterior chain including glutes, hamstrings, and back.

name: Overhead Press
description: A weightlifting exercise that works the shoulders, upper chest, and triceps.

name: Barbell Row
description: A back-focused strength exercise using a barbell to develop lats and upper back.

name: Bicep Curl
description: An isolation exercise that targets the biceps using dumbbells or a barbell.

name: Tricep Extension
description: An exercise that targets the triceps using a dumbbell, barbell, or cable machine.

name: Running
description: A cardio activity that improves cardiovascular endurance and burns calories.

name: Cycling
description: A low-impact cardiovascular exercise that strengthens the legs and improves endurance.

name: Jump Rope
description: A full-body cardio exercise that improves coordination and cardiovascular fitness.

name: Plank
description: An isometric core exercise that strengthens abdominal and lower back muscles.

name: Lunges
description: A lower-body strength exercise targeting the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.
